trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"></xref> event.
The BuildEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.

This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.
The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
The date and time to associate with the event.
Gets or sets location contextual information.
This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> object representing the location contextual information.
Gets the Help keyword for the event.
The Help keyword for the event.
Gets the message for the event.
The message for the event.
Gets the name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
The name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
Gets the time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
The time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
